QuestData.Title: In Search of Sedai
QuestData.Description: Hear my plight, $c. My brother, Sedai, left long ago to contact the orcs of Mag'har Post. Ever the idealist, he thought the time was ripe to set our differences aside and negotiate a peace with them.$B$BHe's been missing for days and I fear for the worst.$B$BWould you set my mind to rest and look for him? Sedai must be somewhere nearby to the east.
QuestData.LogDescription: Anchorite Obadei wants you to look for his brother, Sedai, nearby to the east in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.RewardText: You've found the body of a young draenei paladin. He appears to have been slain by a blow to his back.
